Old Bread.Description: Well... it's better than nothing right?

Potion.Description: A medicinal drink with a bitter taste, the formula is a trade secret.

Ether.Description: A blue drink that's effective in restoring mana. Tastes really bad.

Hi-Ether.Description: A more effective ether... you feel bad for the mages that have to drink this.

Hi-Potion.Description: A refined potion who's effectiveness increased alongside it's bitterness

Dragon Tear.Description: Tears shed by a benevolent Dragon. It has strong healing properties

Medicinal Herbs.Description: Local herbs that cure poisons and toxins

Bandages.Description: A set of clean bandages made to stop bleeding

Elixir.Description: Restores the users health, mana and cures all ailments

Ointment.Description: Ointment that is very effective when used on burns

Paralyze Tonic.Description: A tonic specifically made for those struck with paralysis

Bomb.Description: An explosive device that's as deadly as it is heavy

Super Bomb.Description: An improved bomb, it's said that even dragons fear this explosive device

Longsword.Description: An old longsword that used to be standard issue for soldiers of a fallen empire

Sword.Description: An old sword you woke up with, it's sharp blade and design seems to have degraded with time

Poisoned Sword.Description:
A sword doused in volatile poison giving it a venomous bite!
it looks like it will break soon

Silver Sword.Description:
A sword with a silver sheen, polished to perfection
The perfect tool to slay a wolf!

Rusty Dagger.Description:
An old dagger you woke up with
On it's pommel has a mysterious marking of a dragon

Poisoned Rusty Dagger.Description:
A dagger doused in volatile poison giving it a venomous bite!
it looks like it will break soon

Runic Blade.Description: A sword with mystical runes along it's body

Silver Runic Blade.Description:
A runic blade with a silver sheen, polished to perfection
The perfect tool to slay a wolf!

Leather Cap.Description: An old leather cap. It's better than nothing.

???.Description:
A sword you woke up with. It cannot be pulled from it's sheath
You feel an ominous energy from it.

Moonstone.Description: A stone that's said to house the power of the moon Goddess

Silver Polish.Description: A polish used to give weapons the power of silver for one battle

Volatile Poison.Description: A dangerous poison that degrades any weapon it touches in exchange for giving it a venomous strike

Gospel Of The Dragons.Description: A book that is at the center of the Dragon Orthodoxy

Ruined Journal #1.Description: A ruined journal, it's aged but it feels familiar

Ruined Journal #2.Description: A ruined journal, the journal is in bad condition with few legible pages

Ruined Journal #3.Description: A ruined journal, blood and other things dirty this journal. only one page remains

Demons: A Short History.Description: A book about the demon race

Old Book.Description: An old book you found in the caves

Old Map.Description:
An old map the shopkeeper sold you, the map is impossible to read
you feel like she cheated you

Basement Key.Description: A key to the basement of the ruined castle

Moonlit Map.Description: The true form of the shopkeepers map, the area looks familiar

Upstairs Key.Description: The key to the upstairs portion of the ruined castle

Emblem.Description: A golden emblem with a dragon on it. You know what you must now do

Werewolf Tooth.Description: Proof of your victory over the mad priest
